comment.author: 36401094@N08
comment._content: This is a Crow camp on the bank of the Little Horn River - not a lake.

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: Thanks very much for this information. We've reviewed the image, and it seems clear that this is a river, rather than a lake. We very much appreciate your input. We weren't able to positively identify the river itself during our research, however. Do you have some reference or source that you could direct us to that would identify the river? Thank you very much for your interest in our collection.
